title: News: Lineup announced for Unknown 2014
content:
Unknown Festival released tickets for 2014 today as well as announcing their initial lineup, Scottish synthpoppers CHVRCHES and Indie veterans Wild Beasts top the bill.

Taking place in a forest by the Adriatic Sea, Unknown is one of many Croatian music festivals gaining popularity for their picturesque locations, eclectic lineups and, of course, cheap-ish booze.

The music and arts festival is in its fourth year and is run by the people behind HideoutFestival, The Warehouse Project and Field Day.

Check out the lineup so far below and find out more from the official website.

LIVE

CHVRCHES / WILD BEASTS
JUNGLE / MOUNT KIMBIE
FOREST SWORDS / HENRIK SCHWARZ / JAMES HOLDEN
KINK / LAPALUX / TEN WALLS

DJ

JOY ORBISON / KIM ANN FOXMAN / MANO LE TOUGH / MICHAEL MAYER / OPTIMO
RUB N TUG / RYAN ELLIOTT / SETH TROXLER / SIMIAN MOBILE DISCO / TALE OF US
THE 2 BEARS / TOTALLY ENORMOUS EXTINCT DINOSAURS / WAZE & ODYSSEY
